html:
10.15.18  4:55 pm   in the reality page, there's a password screen, and i keep trying to put random stuff on it when im bored. ive always assumed that it wasnt actually a password screen
should i stop?
thanks

     it is not a real password screen. essentially what happens when you submit something there is the same thing that happens when you press your delete key

10.15.18  4:31 pm   Your songs sound like what I do when I get bored of something, or frustrated at it, or I just want to sing, and I start vocalizing random notes with mostly random words. This makes all of your music sound like something from the depths of my subconscious. What do you have to say to this?

     i'm wondering if that means it's good

10.15.18  4:14 pm   So I'm curious, is there any particular reason you like to use 25 frames per second? Or no?

     i don't know how to change it and it never mattered enough to figure out

10.15.18  3:58 pm   are you menally sane

     sure

10.15.18  3:53 pm   How do you respond to hhaters?

     learning

10.15.18  3:39 pm   what is feel sure (eat bread) about?

     sort of your typical day i guess

10.15.18  3:19 pm   Can you give me a short explanation of 7th chords and diminished/aug chords? i learned to use major/minor/flat/sharp chords while playing pop but jazzy stuff has some unfamiliar chords. im trying to play what you wont do for love right now and its got c#7#9 like what does that even mean

     the way that type of song uses the notation system is a bit oblique .... very normal but not a good starting point for learning chord symbols. i can tell you what chord goes there in that song, it's C# in the bass, and you're gonna want B, F, and E in the mid range. but it may not be clear how we get that from the C#7#9 chord symbol. to get the chord symbol thing a bit better, i think you should start in the key of C, and for your first example just play C major chord (the chord symbol for that is just C), and then add a Bb note to it. that is C7. that's just what that is. good starting place ...... when i was young, someone confided in me that C7 is the perfect way to signal you're about to go to the F chord. try it ... try a song in C, and play some things in the key of C and then drop that C7 and bam, the whole world knows it's time to go to F now. i think that's a good starting point ... that's where i started ... i'll never forget when i learned that. changed my life. i still use that principle in almost every song

10.15.18  2:58 pm   can you give us a random 1 second sneak peak of your next video, or at least just the song?

     there was 1 bar of music notation posted to instagram, including melody lyric and chord

10.15.18  2:54 pm   Hi Bill i record with a headset mic but the recordings have a lotta noise in them (not sure about the term, might be static?).can i get better recordings with what the headset mic? i use the noise reduction tool on audacity but it's still not as good as i want it to be.

     the first step is to try something different. anything. now you've tried 2 things and you'll know which of those things is better, and how they differ. the next step is to try a 3rd thing. step by step, it is an easy road to complete expertise

10.15.18  2:25 pm   You think music students throw bets on like your keys & shit every 2 weeks?

     that would be interesting. i absolutely try to never use the same key for 2 songs in a row. that's just an insider tip

10.15.18  2:23 pm   10.13.18  6:18 am are humans also all the same one?

wait... is everything the same thing? kind of, yea... thanks

     looks like you got that squared away

10.15.18  1:45 pm   Are you Mt. St Hellenes?

     no but i played that role recently

10.15.18  12:48 pm   10.14.18  5:11 pm ...by not doing the other things you plan on doing? That's my point, you've been prioritizing creating new songs/videos for a long while, and I don't see you stopping any time soon to do the other stuff you want to do. I guess I should ask this instead: Are you ever planning to take a short break from creating music to work on making reality videos any time soon (say, within the next 6 months)?

     it would actually be my dream to incorporate it swiftly into the regular agenda. you may think it's impossible, but the current agenda has been wildly impossible for years and now i'm doing it

10.15.18  12:35 pm   why oh why do skeleton people come and ruin my day? I'm just trying to live my life but,, I can't do that when skeleton people come and cramp my style!!

     they want candy for no reason. actually they do have a reason, they like it. but they think you will give it to them, which is probably something their parents told them

10.15.18  11:50 am   Why r u not a juice bar at the local Gold Gym

     i don't know

10.15.18  11:47 am   If you could describe your work in 2 words, how would you do it?

     bill wurtz

10.15.18  11:34 am   can i just learn how to play drums? any tips, trix? 

     start with the sticks. get a pad. find a steady click. start playing things

10.15.18  11:24 am   How can I stop comparing myself to others?

     start comparing them to you

10.15.18  11:02 am   What do you think about climate change?

     seems legit

10.15.18  11:00 am   do you think plants feel love?

     they are love

10.15.18  10:57 am   I know you answer a lot of questions but do you ever ask questions? 

     yes

10.15.18  10:08 am   Will you be picking up the newest Smash Bros?

     we'll see if it has enough characters for my taste

10.15.18  9:20 am   Have you heard Despacito?

     yes

10.15.18  9:15 am   Are you experienced?

     somewhat but not entirely

10.15.18  9:04 am   Do you think that bob ross is really having fun when he beats the devil out of his paint brushes or is it all for the camera :(

     i think it is very difficult to determine bob ross's mood. his entire routine is nearly identical every single show, and i've heard rumours that he would often get headaches, and no one could tell except maybe his wife

10.15.18  8:20 am   Hi bill wurtz. I stayed up all night trapped in an all-consuming spiral of despair for humanity at large, finished my homework in less than an hour at 5:17am, and got 100% on it. Are you proud? 

     yes

10.15.18  7:20 am   Generally how long does it take to answer these questions

     1 second unless the question stirs up a deep conflict within my soul

10.15.18  4:26 am   your relationship with neon?

     none

10.15.18  3:26 am   What if strawberries were bright green?

     that would be front page news, actually no it wouldn't because they would already be. it would only be front page news if it changed

10.15.18  3:21 am   wtf was that video on your instagram for

     the same thing that 99% of my instagram posts are for

10.15.18  2:40 am   Are questions RACIST?

     they can be

10.15.18  1:32 am   the best thing about the art is when you see/hear it

     making it is also pretty crazy too sometimes

10.15.18  1:20 am   is there a hell?

     it's a state of mind

10.15.18  1:02 am   whens the new song?

     now

10.15.18  12:31 am   Do you have a favorite dance move?

     running

10.14.18  11:15 pm   Is it fun writing songs

     oh hell yeah

10.14.18  10:49 pm   ever since best friends with my own front door came out your upload schedule got tighter, why is that

     actually it happened 2 weeks before that

10.14.18  10:25 pm   do u ever sacrifice ur physical health (getting less sleep, skipping lunch, etc.) to spend more time Making Content?

     not on purpose

      if u do, is it worth it in the end?

     in unforseen circumstances it may happen, but it's not a good strategy or habit

10.14.18  10:24 pm   is life really only about answering questions with "yes, and more"?

     no

10.14.18  9:29 pm   what's the biggest weakness of the human body? 

     death?

10.14.18  9:21 pm   so bill ive been learning piano for about 7 years now with a teacher, and ive gotten quite comfortable with understanding chords and stuff, but i am still not comfortable with reading sheet music. ive tried exercises and stuff but its just hard for me to understand it quickly. your music has really inspired me to want to pursue music as my college major but i know i need to get this down. idk if its my adhd or whateves but i figured u might have sum good advice so yeah 

     you could start with some song books, and just do the melody or the chords. or maybe just the rhythms. do it at a very slow tempo. if that's still too confusing then just get some practice exercises. in the old days you would get that at the bookstore but nowadays you can find anything online

10.14.18  8:39 pm   Is the cultural trend of individualism and the rejection of collectivism a beneficial or detrimental trend?

     different

10.14.18  7:28 pm   Do you need perfect pitch to be able to transcribe music?

     no

10.14.18  6:53 pm   it's ok if you don't finish the video by Tuesday.

     that's not true

      if you feel like you need a few more days to finish it up, that's fine by me.

     negotiating for more time never stops at just a couple days. once you open that door it's weeks more

      what really matters is that you have pledged a commitment to get your videos done faster.

     i've been doing that all year and it never worked until i signed a cold hard contract

      honestly, i am proud of the work you have done in the past couple of months. but i just don't think that it's worth sacrificing quality just to feed your hungry viewers.

     this is a training exercise to increase the quality in ways i never would have found otherwise

      from my scientific reasoning, i think that creating a deadline for your uploads is causing your stress level to go completely berzerk.

     that is somewhat true temporarily, but then very quickly teaches me a whole host of new lessons in how to reduce it, which in turn will lead me directly to the lessons on how to do this better and more effectively

      what's the outcome?

     drastically increasing my rate of improvement, growth, and strength, in virtually every area of my life, in more ways than i ever would have expected

      we (the fans) get brand new content from you bi-weekly, which feels great, remembering that it used to take 8-10 weeks to get a single music video. but what about you bill?

     it's the biggest breakthrough i've had since the 5-day schedule in early 2014

10.14.18  6:20 pm   Sorry for the length of this, but I was recently reading an interview with Haruki Murakami, an absolutely remarkable Japanese author, and his response to one of the questions reminded me of you.

"Interviewer: It seems to be difficult for you to talk too much about the underlying meanings of your work.

Murakami: People are always asking me about the books: "What do you mean by this; what do you mean by that?" But I cannot explain anything at all. I talk about myself, and I talk about the world, metaphorically, and you cannot explain or analyze metaphors - you just have to accept the form. A book is a metaphor."

Do you relate to his answer? When people ask about the 'meaning' of your songs, is your thought process about the question similar to his?

     the way i feel when someone asks me this is sort of like how i would feel if i were a chef, and then the customers eat the food and then ask me how it tasted

10.14.18  5:11 pm   if you plan on doing everything (reality, keys+voc, etc.) but are only really doing one thing (song & song/videos every 2 weeks) when will you ever find the time to do the other stuff?

     how did i find the time to do what i do now

     you are doing ok

     they will be strong

     mount st. helens

     i don't know but it said 420 when i got here
